name: CatamountJack
text:
I was a Launchy fan until I ran across [FARR (Find And Run Robot)][1].  On the upside, it is extremely powerful, has lots of features and lots of plug-ins (including an "Everything" plug-in), a great support forum and community, and a friendly and responsive developer.  The only downside is that it sacrifices some simplicity for its feature-set, but (personally) the trade off is WELL worth it if you don't mind spending a few minutes tweaking it.  Been running it on Win 7 for a few months now and it's working well.


  [1]: http://www.donationcoder.com/Software/Mouser/findrun/index.html
